document_data.name: ''Doomwarding''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Doomwarding''''' was a [[weapon quality]] that could be applied to magic weapons that warded off fate.
document_data.Powers: As new, it usually had seven charges, one of which could be used by the wielder to give a very brief burst of speed in which to act or to improve their luck in one action.
document_data.Creation: Applying the ''doomwarding'' quality required the ''[[Limited Wish|limited wish]]'' spell.
document_data.History: ''Doomwarding'' weapons were occasionally gifted to adventurers who won the favor of the [[church of Tymora]].
document_data.Notable ''Doomwarding'' Weapons: * [[Oath-hammer]]s, these dwarven-made [[warhammer]]s were occasionally crafted with the ''doomwarding'' quality.
